alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 7:31PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN MEADE AND CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM MDT... At 731 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Rapid City to Bear Country. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rapid City, northwestern Rapid Valley, and Reptile Gardens around 735 PM MDT. Northwestern Ellsworth Air Force Base and Black Hawk around 740 PM MDT. Summerset around 750 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 48 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills
